eventList.name: Surviving a Duel in 30 days
eventList.description: This four-hour introductory course works from the ground up, starting with increasingly complex footwork drills, the building blocks of the Bolognese system, before going through three guards - code lunga stretta, porta di ferro stretta, and guardia d'alicorno - and the angles of attack. From there it continues through how to defend against all attacks so you can make it through a duel in one piece.
